statement.name: INSERT_SMACMP
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smacmp( codcia, codcmp, nomcmp, npqcmp, nrocmp, tpocmp, valcmp, fhacmp, nrofte, klcfte, obscmp) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMACMP
statement.sql: UPDATE smacmp SET codcia=?, codcmp=?, nomcmp=?, npqcmp=?, tpocmp=?, valcmp=?, fhacmp=?, nrofte=?, klcfte=?, obscmp=? WHERE nrocmp=?
